questions.questionText: What skills or hobbies do you currently have or enjoy? (Select all that apply)
options: 🖌️ Creative skills (e.g. graphic design- video editing- crafting)
💻 Tech skills (e.g., coding- web development- app development)
📱 Social media skills (e.g.- content creation- social media management)
✍️ Writing and communication (e.g. blogging- copywriting- public speaking)
📚 Teaching or mentoring
🛠️ Hands-on skills (e.g. DIY- repair- event planning)
🌟 Other (Specify)

questions.questionText: How much time can you dedicate to a side hustle per week?
options: ⏱️ Less than 5 hours
⏱️ 5–10 hours
⏱️ 10–20 hours
⏱️ 20+ hours

questions.questionText: What is your primary goal for starting a side hustle? (Select one)
options: 💵 Extra income
🎓 Building new skills
🌐 Expanding my network
🚀 Turning it into a full-time business
🌟 Other (Specify)

questions.questionText: Do you prefer working online, offline, or a mix of both?
options: 🌐 Online only
🏢 Offline only
🔄 A mix of both

questions.questionText: Are you comfortable investing money upfront to start your side hustle? If yes, how much?
options: ❌ No investment
💸 Under $100

questions.questionText: What concerns you most about starting a side hustle?
options: ❓ Not knowing where to start or who to trust
🚫 Falling for unrealistic promises or scams
⏳ Wasting time on things that don’t work
💰 Investing time and effort without clear results

questions.questionText: Which of these approaches to success resonates most with you?
options: 🏋️ 'Hard work and dedication lead to sustainable results.'
📚 'Learning and skill-building are key to long-term success.'
📊 'Using data and credible insights to make smart decisions.'
💨 'Quick wins are fine, but I value steady growth.'

questions.questionText: How confident are you in finding the right side hustle for yourself?
options: 🤔 Not confident at all – I don’t know where to start.
😬 Somewhat confident – I have an idea but need guidance.
😊 Confident – I know what I want but need a clear roadmap.
💪 Very confident – I just need tools to track my progress.

questions.questionText: What would make you feel fully prepared to succeed in a side hustle?
options: ✅ A personalized roadmap to get started.
🛠️ Tools and resources to learn new skills.
📈 Insights into earning potential and market trends.
🤝 Access to a community of like-minded side hustlers.
